text: Bisphenol A diglycidyl ether (acronym BADGE or DGEBA) is an organic compound. It is an ingredient in epoxy resin. == Preparation == BADGE is made by alkylation of the hydroxy groups of bisphenol A. Epichlorohydrin is the main reactant, and produces hydrochloric acid as a byproduct. Category:Aromatic compounds Category:Epoxides Category:Ethers Category:Monomers
title: Bisphenol A diglycidyl ether
